body: Zucchini has this great, refined style of art. But his works are, if not straight up treating women as livestock(I don't like it very much), then its straight up femdom which is I severely find repulsive. Can't it just be in the middleground? Like the man is in control but the woman isn't a pushover either.
This guy has the best fucking art. Now if only he'd do a Harem, or something that's not incest all the time.
